short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly save the timestamp of playing Spotify, YouTube or SoundCloud media, on screen or in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Venom is an incredibly fast Spotify and YouTube bookmarker, allowing music listeners to bookmark place a bookmark on the press of a hotkey, even when music is playing in the background or on another device.

Each bookmark records the elapsed time through the media, allowing you to pick up from where you left off later on.

Your bookmarks can be exported either as .CSV (Comma-separated values) or directly to a Spotify playlist in just a click.

To view your saved timestamps, just click Venom's icon in the Extensions pane at the top-right of the screen.
